pages.text: Witchcraft utilizes several natural $(marked)crops$() for the art. These crops are used for $(l:bewitchment:rituals/ritual_intro)rituals$(), $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)brewing$() and many other things.$(br)Seeds for these crops can be found in $(marked)wild grass$(), much like other seeds.

The four regular crops are $(item)Aconite$(), $(item)Belladonna$(), $(item)Garlic$() and $(item)Mandrake$().$(br)Aconite is mostly used as a neurotoxin, whereas Belladonna is known for causing physical harm. Mandrake enhances magic, and Garlic embodies healing.
Garlic can also be roasted into delicious $(item)Grilled Garlic$().
Grilled Garlic can in turn be crafted into even more delicious $(item)Garlic Bread$().
